mapper.delete: /* 말머리 삭제, NoticeMapper.deletePrepend */ DELETE FROM PREPEND WHERE UPPERSEQ = #{seq}
mapper.select: /* 게시글에 맞는 말머리 리스트 검색, NoticeMapper.selectOnePrepend */ SELECT PREPEND, UPPERSEQ FROM PREPEND WHERE UPPERSEQ = #{seq}

/* 템플릿 데이터 상세 조회, NoticeMapper.selectOneNotice */ SELECT SEQ , TEMPLATE , NOTICE , LOWER_SEQ AS "lowerSeq" , UPPER_SEQ AS "upperSeq" , USE_YN AS "useYn" , CREATED_AT AS "createdAt" , TITLE FROM NOTICE WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.delete: /* 템플릿 삭제, NoticeMapper.deleteNotice */ DELETE FROM NOTICE WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
